Risk Description: Metal frame becomes dangerous projectile when exposed to MRI magnetic field causing severe injury or equipment damage
Risk Mitigation: Establish 5-gauss line controls and use physical barriers between frame and MRI suite

Risk Description: Metal frame components cause significant artifacts in MRI images compromising test results
Risk Mitigation: Use non-ferromagnetic materials where possible and establish frame positioning guidelines to minimize interference

Risk Description: Risk of musculoskeletal injury during manual handling of heavy metal frame components
Risk Mitigation: Provide mechanical lifting aids and implement proper team lifting techniques training
